title: CoinShares reports 26% AUM increase to $3.46B in Q2
summary: CoinShares reports $32.4M profit in Q2 and eyes US listing. Executives anticipate growth in second half with Bitcoin and Ether reaching record highs.

body.raw:
![ CoinShares reports 26% AUM increase to $3.46B in Q2 ](https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/528_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjQtMTEvMDE5Mzc2YWEtODM0NC03YmQ4LTg1YTEtNzNiMTVlYzRkZGZk.jpg)

CoinShares reports $32.4M profit in Q2 and eyes US listing. Executives anticipate growth in second half with Bitcoin and Ether reaching record highs.

---

**Original Article:** [Cointelegraph.com News](https://cointelegraph.com/news/coinshares-q2-2025-net-profit-32m-aum-growth-26?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound)
